title: FontCreator Professional v7.0.1 By NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
Year / Date of Release: 2013
Version: 7.0.1 build 458
Bit depth: 32bit, 64bit
Language: English + (Russian - Portable)
Medicine: Present

System requirements:
Windows 2000, XP, Vista, 7, 8 (32/64 bit)

FontCreator - Font Editor FontCreator can create their own fonts, transfer font file in any font from paper through the scan, edit fonts already installed. To create your own handwriting font, you can simply write on paper by hand (no plate), all Russian and English letters, numbers, special characters, punctuation, etc., scan the sheet, and a "copy-paste" to insert each character in the each cell of the new glyph font observing indexes.
In the Professional edition features check the font can improve the quality of your fonts. Tools to simplify and speed up the glyph design process. Powerful transformation script allows you to create hundreds of additional characters in seconds, to automatically generate outlines for more than 2,200 characters.
